      • removeCycles

        public static Node[] removeCycles(Node[] nodes,
                                  Node[] visitedNodes)
        Compares two arrays of Nodes and removes the buckets from nodes that are present on visitedNodes.
        Parameters:
        nodes - the array that non-unique nodes will be removed from
        visitedNodes - the elements that will be avoided in the output array
        Returns:
        a array without cycles
        See Also:
        Node

      • append

        public static Node[] append(Node[] path,
                            Node newNode)
        Generates a new array with the newNode appended to the end.
        Parameters:
        path - the source path
        newNode - the new node to be appended
        Returns:
        Node array representing a path with the new node appended
        See Also:
        Node

      • findShortest

        public static Node[] findShortest(java.util.List<Node[]> paths)
        Finds the shortest path from a path list. The shortest path is the one with the lowest length.
        Parameters:
        paths - the path list to be searched
        Returns:
        the shortest path

      • printPath

        public static void printPath(Node[] path)
        Prints an array of nodes as a list of tuples
        Parameters:
        path - the path to print
